TopicTitle: Info on how to convert your Plugin to KSP 1.1

Articles.Content:
This line: 

if (FlightResultsDialog.isDisplaying) {

Is causing a NullReferenceException when in flight.

Before I report this as a bug, does anyone have a comment?
One thread is untenable.  I have moved this to the new section and am locking it.  Please create threads to discuss specific aspects.  @sarbian let me know if you need to edit.
